name: Similars: Climb
description:
A collection of strange objects in a three-dimensional cloud that you rotate yourself. Some objects hide behind each other, some behind unpredictable walls.

Eliminate them all. Clear the cloud and take another step in your climb to the top. Relax between the levels, look at statistics and ranking lists, prepare yourself for the next challenge.

In Similars Climb you are immortal, but punished for your mistakes.


What is required of you


  • Total concentration under time pressure.
  • A well-developed short-term memory.
  • Attention to details and shapes.
  • No luck, just skill.

What the game offers


  • Simple and clear help page that explains the simple rules.
  • Statistics and ranking lists for all levels of climbing.
  • Achievements. Some are easy, others hard enough to make you proud.
  • Top ranking list for the world's fastest climber.
  • Frustration. In a good way.
